June 8, 1957 D Welsh Miners Gala (Second Section)
Welsh Miners Gala (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Welsh Miners Gala welsh-miners-gala-second-section
None
Pavilion, Sophia Gardens, Cardiff Result from British Bandsman 15/6/57. However I believe that the conductors of Garw and Ystalyfera have been accidentally mixed up. Lewis was Ystalyfera conductor for years and Roy was Garw.
Aug. 13, 2013, 2:58 p.m. March 28, 2020, 11:47 a.m.
1 Markham and District Band Thomas James Powell
2 Garw Valley Silver Lewis Williams
3 Ystalyfera Public Roy Williams
